heroDescription: Bachelor in Computer Information Systems, passionate about developing mobile and web applications using Flutter. I have practical experience in building diverse applications like forums, delivery systems, portfolios, and dashboards etc...
choseTheLanguage: Chose The CV Language You Want To See
aboutSubtitle: Get to know more about me and my journey
aboutParagraph1: I am a passionate software developer with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Information Systems and several years of hands-on programming experience. I specialize in building modern, high-performance Flutter applications that deliver exceptional user experiences and real-world impact.
aboutParagraph2: Throughout my journey, I have developed a wide range of applications — including forum platforms, food delivery systems, e-commerce dashboards, portfolio websites, and online store apps. My focus is on crafting seamless, user-centric experiences that solve practical business challenges across mobile and web platforms.
aboutParagraph3: As a freelance developer, I'm driven by the challenge of turning complex ideas into elegant, fully functional solutions. My full-stack expertise spans from designing intuitive UI/UX with Flutter to building robust backends using Laravel, and managing APIs and databases for scalable, maintainable performance.
skillsSubtitle: Technologies I work with and my proficiency levels
laravelDescription: Powerful backend framework for RESTful APIs
projectsSubtitle: A showcase of my recent work and personal projects
foodly_description: Modern food delivery app built with Flutter, offering an exceptional user experience for ordering your favorite meals.
lino_description: Chat app with real-time messaging, user profiles, and media sharing, built using Flutter for seamless communication.
forum_description: A comprehensive forum application that allows users to create accounts, write posts, and interact through comments. Built with Flutter for the frontend and Laravel for the backend.
forum_backend_description: A comprehensive forum application backend that allows users to create accounts, write posts, and interact through comments. Built with Laravel and MySQL.
shoply_admin_description: A modern, responsive e-commerce admin dashboard built with Flutter Web and connected to Supabase backend. This dashboard provides comprehensive management tools for products, users, orders, and analytics.
shoply_description: A modern, responsive e-commerce app built with Flutter and connected to Supabase backend. This app provides a user-friendly interface for shopping and managing products.
portfolio_description: This personal portfolio website built with Flutter Web, featuring modern design, smooth animations, and responsive layout across all devices.
showcase_description: A collection of my professional certifications and educational achievements
computer_essentials_description: Comprehensive course covering computer basics, internet usage, and essential software applications.
interaction_design_description: Fundamentals of interaction design, user experience principles, and usability testing.
practical_programs_description: Hands-on course on essential computer programs including MS Office and Google Workspace.
ui_ux_design_description: Fundamentals of UI/UX design, user experience principles, and usability testing.
user_experience_description: This course is about what it takes to understand users, design for them, and evaluate your designs.
ui_principles_description: This course explains the principles of visual design and how to apply them to create effective user interfaces.
ux_research_description: This course covers the basic knowledge of UX research, including planning, conducting, and analyzing research studies.
